tr.td:
Only needed beyond 12 months if for treatment of anemia (4mg/kg dosing). Treatment doses are for 3 months)
Hemoglobin: (if available)
Dose for child:

Only needed beyond 12 months if for treatment of anemia (4mg/kg dosing). Treatment doses are for 3 months)
Dose for child:

Preterm infants are at increased risk of retinopathy of prematurity (ROP). If vision concerns noted, refer to opthalmology with concern of ROP. All children under 1250g at birth to be referred to DH Ophthalmology at 2 month of age
